title: tAndAm tamadena
sahitya:
tAndAm tamadena mamatai illAmalE sattiyat-toNDu sheivOm pOdu jana mana magizhndiDavE


anupallavi

  kAntAmaNI cintAmaNI sukhamaNI kaNmaNi kadirmaNi gati tarum gurumaNikkE


caraNam    kAmam shUdu kolaigaT-kaLavinriyE kaDum sina vEgamum mOhamum inriyE
kSEmamAgum iSTa kAma divya nAma japattuDan nallavar kUDiyE
